4308910.name: Legend of the Coin Knight Demo
4308910.description:
Save the five fractured islands of Korhana as the legendary coin hound's son, Jac, and in the process rescue your father's soul from damnation. And also joining you on this adventure is your trusted pal, Kat Knip the cat.

Upgrades, exploration and talking to charming NPCs, while using that noggin of yours, is what coinhound's specialize in.

On this island centric planet named Korhana, you will have to talk to many different kinds of people,

solve interesting puzzles, and manage you're inventory. Gather as many potions and ethers as you can,

There's merchants scattered all around the 5 fractured islands. They are known to contain things more powerful

than one's mind can even imagine. But be careful, the journey ahead is filled with tons of bad guys and monsters

ready to pick a fight with you. Also powerful bosses that will push you to use everything you have.

You're Jac the coinhound from palm tree island. Your three best friends, Kat Knip the talking cat, Shane Silver,

and Rafael Gearhartz are also here to lend a helping hand or paw when they can. Without you guys,

Manatos Minos, the main villain of this story. Will destroy everything you love with the great Spell

Fire. But why?

Your fathers soul is on the line, and so is everyone else's on the planet.

This Demo is 1 to 2 hours long.

Key Features:

  • Story is around 7-10 hours

  • 5 distinct islands

  • Around 30 missions across the board

  • Level up to 20

  • Real time hack & Slash

  • Different enemies and up to 10 bosses

  • Mini games such as dancing and snowboarding

  • Xbox Controller ready

  • Relaxing

  • Over 30 songs

  • Over 15 puzzles

  • Combat System that has magic and summons

  • Immersive story

  • A talking cat
